title: Auto Permanent Unlock with Ultimate Skin Shards
body:
With the new 8.5 patch out we now have:

BIG DROP, FREE UNLOCK Ultimate and Mythic skins will now drop as auto-redeeming permanents (no orange essence required to upgrade them). If you already own the skin, you'll be able to disenchant the permanent for orange essence.

What does this mean for us players who recently acquired or have been holding onto our Ultimate skin shards? Will we automatically get the skin with the new patch in effect, or will we unfortunately still have to craft it?

Wongza

replies.body: You still have to craft it with 2950 orange essence bro ive been holding onto my dj sona skin shard cuz i didnt have enuf essence and now they release this shjt for people while im here watchin my skin shard not being unlocked
Only applies to new drops not existing ones

You could try contacting [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and seeing if they're able/willing to do it manually.

It's a long shot, but there's no harm in asking.

Best guess, the change will only apply to shards that are acquired *after* the change, so no applying retro-actively (it doesn't state that it applies retro-actively, so...). I'm honestly not sure if I have any Ultimate or Mythic skin shards, but I'm about to log onto the client now and check. I'll update this post once I've checked my accounts.

EDIT: No Ultimate or Mythic skins shards on my end...
